definition: to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)
A small hole not plugged will make you suffer a big hole (idiom); A stitch in time saves nine.
pinyin: xiao3 dong4 bu4 du3 , da4 dong4 shou4 ku3

sentences.english: He could see how his suffering was all the mercy of the Lord coming in disguise.
sentences.chinese: 他能明白他的受苦如何都是僞裝而來的主的仁慈。

sentences.english: Because he himself suffered when he was tempted, he is able to help those who are being tempted.
sentences.chinese: 他自己既然被試探而受苦，就能撘救被試探的人。

sentences.english: As the United States suffers under Obamanomics , China prospers under Capitalism.
sentences.chinese: 美國在奧巴馬經濟下受苦，中國在資本主義下繁榮。

sentences.english: He recognizes the chastisement of God as the reason for his suffering.
sentences.chinese: 他承認上帝的責罰是他受苦的原因。

sentences.english: God despises suffering and wants us to be healed.
sentences.chinese: 上帝看不得人們受苦，總想醫治我們。

sentences.english: Anyone who likes watching people suffer is cruel .
sentences.chinese: 喜歡看到別人受苦的人是殘酷無情的。

sentences.english: You have been the veterans of creative suffering.
sentences.chinese: 你們已是爲創造而受苦的老戰士。

sentences.english: Down the Via Dolorosa called the "Way of Suffering."
sentences.chinese: 沿著維亞多樂羅莎大道，這條被稱爲“受苦之路”。

sentences.english: Now are we willing to be, to do, or to suffer as the LORD wills.
sentences.chinese: 現在我們甘心情願地願意爲上帝而活，爲上帝受苦。

sentences.english: The school of suffering graduates rare scholars.--- Selected.
sentences.chinese: 受苦學校畢業的學生絕少。

sentences.english: What prophecies about Jesus' suffering can you find out from ISA 53?
sentences.chinese: 章受苦僕人之歌中有那些預言與主耶穌受苦有關？

sentences.english: What prophecies about Jesus' suffering can you find out from ISA 53?
sentences.chinese: 章受苦僕人之歌中有那些預言與主耶穌受苦有關？

sentences.english: The great thing is to suffer without being discouraged.–Fenelon
sentences.chinese: 受苦而不挫氣，是一件偉大的事情。

sentences.english: The "mountain-top" experience seems to aim at reconfirming his mission of suffering on earth.
sentences.chinese: “登峯”的經驗，似乎再次確認祂在世上受苦的使命。

sentences.english: U. G. : Suffering is an experience, and there is no experience here.
sentences.chinese: 受苦是一種經驗，而本質上這裏沒有經驗。

sentences.english: She was portioned with sorrow throughout her life.
sentences.chinese: 她命中註定一輩子受苦。

definition: to endure/to suffer/hardships/torments/a hard time/a nuisance
to suffer a calamity/to suffer (e.g. under torture)/distress
to live comfortably/happy and prosperous life
to suffer enough from/to suffer all kinds of/to have one's fill of
